title: Consider Audience Interests
text: Think about what the audience is interested in before preparing the presentation.

title: Avoid Complex Jargon
text: Avoid using complex jargon that might confuse the audience and make the presentation less digestible and interpretable for a wide audience.

title: Focus on Audience Needs
text: Focus on addressing the needs of the audience during the presentation, and not the needs of just the presenter.

title: Consider Feedback
text: Audience feedback is one of the most important sources of information to how to better improve the presentation.
